update.description:
requires [this ignition-common pull request](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/63/port-colladaloader-transparency-fixes), otherwise you'll see an empty screen when running the mesh viewer example

Also fixed loading mesh materials, updated material class api (mainly coding style changes), and added material unit test.



TODOs:

- Optix mesh not working yet

- The RGB values of textures in Optix material optix seems to be flipped
update.title: Add mesh viewer example and fix mesh textures

content.raw: the implementation switches between cameras created by the different render engines to show users the scene generated by those render engines. So more or less switching between render engines.
